content.rendered:
[vc_row css_animation= » » row_type= »row » use_row_as_full_screen_section= »no » type= »grid » angled_section= »no » text_align= »left » background_image_as_pattern= »without_pattern » anchor= »ouvrages » z_index= » » css= ».vc_custom_1559857067711{padding-top: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 20px !important;} »][vc_column][vc_column_text css= ».vc_custom_1559736005885{padding-top: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 20px !important;} »]

Our projects

[/vc_column_text][vc_separator type= »small » position= »center » color= »#00a0e3″][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css_animation= » » row_type= »row » use_row_as_full_screen_section= »no » type= »full_width » angled_section= »no » text_align= »left » background_image_as_pattern= »without_pattern » css= ».vc_custom_1559809309492{padding-top: 50px !important;padding-bottom: 50px !important;} » z_index= » »][vc_column][vc_column_text]The projects supported by Break Poverty are subject to a strict selection process based on four main criteria:

  1. Pertinence: the proposed action must respond to the social need
  2. Efficiency: the proposed action works and there is proof of its efficiency in the region in question (or in another region)
  3. Solidity of the organization: the action can be scaled up to meet the objectives it has set
  4. Synergy: the action presents synergies with existing projects

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css_animation= » » row_type= »row » use_row_as_full_screen_section= »no » type= »full_width » angled_section= »no » text_align= »left » background_image_as_pattern= »without_pattern »][vc_column][vc_empty_space][vc_column_text]

Support for young children

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space][vc_row_inner row_type= »row » type= »full_width » text_align= »left » css_animation= » »][vc_column_inner width= »1/2″][vc_single_image image= »30032″ img_size= »350×200″ alignment= »center » qode_css_animation= » »][vc_empty_space][vc_column_text]

EPEE

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]

Training all professional staff working with young children and raising parental awareness to prevent late development in 0-3 year-olds.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width= »1/2″][vc_single_image image= »30033″ img_size= »350×200″ alignment= »center » qode_css_animation= » »][vc_empty_space][vc_column_text]

Regart’s

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]

Organizing workshops to support 1st to 5th grade students in Nantes’ Bellevue district and prevent school dropout.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_empty_space][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css_animation= » » row_type= »row » use_row_as_full_screen_section= »no » type= »full_width » angled_section= »no » text_align= »left » background_image_as_pattern= »without_pattern »][vc_column][vc_column_text]

Combatting school dropout

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space][vc_row_inner row_type= »row » type= »full_width » text_align= »left » css_animation= » »][vc_column_inner width= »1/3″][vc_single_image image= »30036″ img_size= »350×200″ alignment= »center » qode_css_animation= » »][vc_empty_space][vc_column_text]

Brio

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]

Providing tutors for high school students in disadvantaged areas to facilitate their access to higher education.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width= »1/3″][vc_single_image image= »30037″ img_size= »350×200″ alignment= »center » qode_css_animation= » »][vc_empty_space][vc_column_text]

Coup de pouce

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]

Preventing school dropout by helping children from 1st grade learn to read.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width= »1/3″][vc_single_image image= »30038″ img_size= »350×200″ alignment= »center » qode_css_animation= » »][vc_empty_space][vc_column_text]

Digitale Académie

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]

A digital academy to combat dropout after the high school exam (baccalauréat) offering remote training courses for young adults at a campus located in the city center.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_empty_space][vc_row_inner row_type= »row » type= »full_width » text_align= »left » css_animation= » »][vc_column_inner width= »1/3″][vc_single_image image= »30045″ img_size= »350×200″ alignment= »center » qode_css_animation= » »][vc_empty_space][vc_column_text]

L’Envol

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]

An intensive 7-month social reintegration program that uses art to support young people suffering from social exclusion.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width= »1/3″][vc_single_image image= »30044″ img_size= »350×200″ alignment= »center » qode_css_animation= » »][vc_empty_space][vc_column_text]

Jeune Envie Motivation

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]

A three-month program focused on self-reflection and professional aspirations rolled out to students aged 14 and above four half-days per week to combat school dropout.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width= »1/3″][vc_single_image image= »30043″ img_size= »350×200″ alignment= »center » qode_css_animation= » »][vc_empty_space][vc_column_text]

Proxité

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]

Facilitating the professional integration of young people in difficulty through mentoring programs with company employees.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css_animation= » » row_type= »row » use_row_as_full_screen_section= »no » type= »full_width » angled_section= »no » text_align= »left » background_image_as_pattern= »without_pattern »][vc_column][vc_empty_space height= »40px »][vc_column_text]

Supporting Professional integration

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space][vc_row_inner row_type= »row » type= »full_width » text_align= »left » css_animation= » »][vc_column_inner width= »1/3″][vc_single_image image= »30047″ img_size= »350×200″ alignment= »center » qode_css_animation= » »][vc_empty_space][vc_column_text]

Becomtech

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]

Awareness-raising and training in digital professions for young girls.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width= »1/3″][vc_single_image image= »30048″ img_size= »350×200″ alignment= »center » qode_css_animation= » »][vc_empty_space][vc_column_text]

La Cravate Solidaire

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]

Supporting disadvantaged job seekers in preparing their interviews and adopting appropriate professional behavior and dress codes.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width= »1/3″][vc_single_image image= »30049″ img_size= »350×200″ alignment= »center » qode_css_animation= » »][vc_empty_space][vc_column_text]

Découverte Métiers

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]Helping students discover the corporate and professional environment through classroom presentations and company visits.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_empty_space][vc_row_inner row_type= »row » type= »full_width » text_align= »left » css_animation= » »][vc_column_inner width= »1/3″][vc_single_image image= »30051″ img_size= »350×200″ alignment= »center » qode_css_animation= » »][vc_empty_space][vc_column_text]

Lab’Elles

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]

A dedicated meeting place close to home where young girls can seek assistance with their personal, school and professional lives.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width= »1/3″][vc_single_image image= »30052″ img_size= »350×200″ alignment= »center » qode_css_animation= » »][vc_empty_space][vc_column_text]

Le Lab

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]

Two-year support program for young people in difficulty aspiring to create their own business.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width= »1/3″][vc_single_image image= »30043″ img_size= »350×200″ alignment= »center » qode_css_animation= » »][vc_empty_space][vc_column_text]

Plombiers du numérique

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]

Program providing dedicated individual or collective assistance, including by company employees, to help reintegrate young people in difficulty in technical professions.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_empty_space][vc_row_inner row_type= »row » type= »full_width » text_align= »left » css_animation= » »][vc_column_inner width= »1/3″][vc_single_image image= »30054″ img_size= »350×200″ alignment= »center » qode_css_animation= » »][vc_empty_space][vc_column_text]

Entreprendre pour Apprendre

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]

A team-based project connecting mid-school students with the professional world through the creation of a business, from the initial idea to the sale of products.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width= »1/3″][vc_single_image image= »30055″ img_size= »350×200″ alignment= »center » qode_css_animation= » »][vc_empty_space][vc_column_text]

Epicerie Sociale et Pédagogique

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]

Helping severely disadvantaged people to escape from poverty by providing food and social aid.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width= »1/3″][vc_single_image image= »30056″ img_size= »350×200″ alignment= »center » qode_css_animation= » »][vc_empty_space][vc_column_text]

Job Academy

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]

A professional reintegration program providing dedicated individual and collective support, including from company employees, for young people in difficulty.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_empty_space][vc_row_inner row_type= »row » type= »full_width » text_align= »left » css_animation= » »][vc_column_inner width= »1/3″][vc_single_image image= »30058″ img_size= »350×200″ alignment= »center » qode_css_animation= » »][vc_empty_space][vc_column_text]

Résilience Factory

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]

Assisting young people from priority neighborhoods with their personal and professional projects in the world of employment, culture and sport.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width= »1/3″][vc_single_image image= »30059″ img_size= »350×200″ alignment= »center » qode_css_animation= » »][vc_empty_space][vc_column_text]

Simplon

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]

Training young people without any qualifications in digital professions to simplify their integration into the world of work.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width= »1/3″][vc_single_image image= »30061″ img_size= »350×200″ alignment= »center » qode_css_animation= » »][vc_empty_space][vc_column_text]

Apprentis Solidaires – l’Afev

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]

Helping young job seekers without qualifications to secure an apprenticeship.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css_animation= » » row_type= »row » use_row_as_full_screen_section= »no » type= »full_width » angled_section= »no » text_align= »left » background_image_as_pattern= »without_pattern »][vc_column][vc_empty_space][vc_column_text]

International projects

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space][vc_single_image image= »30062″ img_size= »350×200″ alignment= »center » qode_css_animation= » »][vc_column_text]

Action Against Hunger – India

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]

Taking action against the causes of malnutrition in the community of Dharni in Maharastra, India.

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space][/vc_column][/vc_row]
